typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	pNomeArquivo as string
}
source(output(
		CLIENTE_ID as string,
		NOMECLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE as string,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as string,
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		MESANOFATURA as string,
		VALOR_FATURA as string,
		SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG as string,
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO as string,
		DATA_FEBRABAN as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		VALOR_ATRIBUICAO as string,
		UF as string,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as date 'yyyyMMdd',
		HORA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	moveFiles: ['atlys/validados_a_processar','atlys/processados']) ~> srcArqAtlysRcbl
source(output(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(38,0)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: ("SELECT ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO FROM CONVENIO.CVTB_LOTE_ARQUIVO WHERE NM_ARQUIVO = '{$pNomeArquivo}'"),
	format: 'query') ~> BuscaLoteArqAtual
BuscaLoteArqAtual derive(SyntheticKey = 1) ~> FakeKey2
srcArqAtlysRcbl derive(SyntheticKey = 1,
		NEW_VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = replace(VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL, ',' , '.'),
		NEW_VALOR_FATURA = replace(VALOR_FATURA, ',' , '.'),
		NEW_SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG = replace(SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG, ',' , '.'),
		NEW_VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO = replace(VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO, ',' , '.'),
		NEW_VALOR_ATRIBUICAO = replace(VALOR_ATRIBUICAO, ',' , '.'),
		NOMECLIENTE = replace(NOMECLIENTE, "\"", "")) ~> FakeKey1
FakeKey1, FakeKey2 join(FakeKey1@SyntheticKey == FakeKey2@SyntheticKey,
	joinType:'inner',
	matchType:'exact',
	ignoreSpaces: false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join
Join sink(allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID_ATLYS_RCBL as decimal(28,0),
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO as decimal(28,0),
		ID_CLIENTE as string,
		NOME_CLIENTE as string,
		CNPJ_CPF as string,
		CONTA_CLIENTE as string,
		CLASSE_RECEBER as string,
		OPERADORA as string,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA as string,
		NUMERO_FATURA as string,
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE as string,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL as decimal(15,2),
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA as string,
		MES_ANO_FATURA as string,
		VALOR_FATURA as decimal(15,2),
		SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG as decimal(15,2),
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA as timestamp,
		VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO as decimal(15,2),
		DATA_FEBRABAN as timestamp,
		VALOR_ATRIBUICAO as decimal(15,2),
		UF as string,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as timestamp,
		HORA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID_LOTE_ARQUIVO,
		ID_CLIENTE = CLIENTE_ID,
		NOME_CLIENTE = NOMECLIENTE,
		CNPJ_CPF,
		CONTA_CLIENTE,
		CLASSE_RECEBER,
		OPERADORA,
		CODIGO_OPERADORA,
		NUMERO_FATURA,
		MES_ANO_REFERENTE,
		VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL = NEW_VALOR_DOCTO_ORIGINAL,
		FATURA_ATRIBUIDA,
		MES_ANO_FATURA = MESANOFATURA,
		VALOR_FATURA = NEW_VALOR_FATURA,
		SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG = NEW_SALDO_DEVIDO_ORIG,
		DATA_EMISSAO_FATURA,
		VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO = NEW_VALOR_TOTAL_PAGAMENTO,
		DATA_FEBRABAN,
		VALOR_ATRIBUICAO = NEW_VALOR_ATRIBUICAO,
		UF,
		DATA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO,
		HORA_ATRIBUICAO_PGTO
	)) ~> GravaTabContestacoesAtlysRcbl
